articles.description: Directed by National Award-winner Blessy, the Malayalam survival drama has been touted as ‘the greatest survival adventure ever.’
articles.content: After a decade-long wait post 2013s Kalimannu, National Award-winning director Blessy is making a comeback with the Malayalam film, The Goat Life. Prabhas took to Instagram on Wednesday to share the … [+2035 chars]
